meanings.sent1: The uncrewed spaceship traveled through space without any people on board.
meanings.sent2: The uncrewed vehicle moved silently across the desert, controlled only by technology.
meanings.sent3: The uncrewed factory seemed like a ghost town, with no workers in sight.
meanings.sent4: The uncrewed aircraft soared through the sky like a lone bird, free from human control.
meanings.sent5: The uncrewed submarine explored the depths of the ocean autonomously, without any crew members.

meanings.sent1: The uncrewed ship sailed smoothly across the sea, devoid of any crew members.
meanings.sent2: The uncrewed drone flew high in the sky, operated remotely without a crew on board.
meanings.sent3: The uncrewed train chugged along the tracks, appearing like a futuristic mode of transportation.
meanings.sent4: The uncrewed spaceship glided through the vastness of space, a solitary traveler without a crew.
meanings.sent5: The uncrewed submarine dove deep into the ocean, exploring the unknown depths without a crew to guide it.

meanings.definition: Not operated or controlled by a crew
meanings.sent1: The uncrewed aircraft flew autonomously, guided by advanced technology instead of a crew.
meanings.sent2: The uncrewed vehicle navigated through the city streets without any human intervention.
meanings.sent3: The uncrewed spaceship orbited the planet, showcasing the capabilities of unmanned exploration.
meanings.sent4: The uncrewed drone hovered in the air, responding to commands without the need for a crew.
meanings.sent5: The uncrewed rover roamed the Martian surface independently, controlled remotely from Earth.
